formattedAddress: 1 Rector Park, New York, NY 10280, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 Rector Park, New York, NY 10280, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of celebrating my promotion on a luxurious yacht cruise along the picturesque Hudson River. It was an absolutely fantastic experience that exceeded all expectations.

1. Stunning Setting:  As we sailed along the Hudson, we were treated to breathtaking views of the New York City skyline, iconic landmarks, and the glistening water.

2. Impeccable Service: The crew onboard was phenomenal - Thank you Captain Paul, Cheryle and Daniela!! They ensured our every need was met with utmost professionalism and friendliness. From the moment we stepped on board, we were warmly greeted and made to feel like VIPs. They went above and beyond to ensure our comfort throughout the entire journey.

3. Gastronomic Delights and Liquid Pleasure: The hors d'oeuvres were delectable. The selection was diverse, catering to various dietary preferences, and the quality of the ingredients used was top-notch. The bartender ensured that no glass was empty.

4. Groove to the Music: The lively music played onboard set the perfect mood for celebration. We were able to play our own music on a state-of-the-art sound system that kept the energy high.

5. Unforgettable Memories: The overall ambiance and experience created everlasting memories. We had ample space to mingle, socialize, and capture precious moments with our friends and colleagues. The combination of stunning views, delectable cuisine, great music, and fantastic company made it a night we will cherish forever.

originalText.text: Our group had the best time sailing for a 'farewell party' hosted by Captain Paul and his crew. The boat was spacious (I believe we had ~30 attendees), clean, and well maintained. Our group was allowed to board early, decorate the boat for the party, arrange for outside food/drink, and play our own music aboard. This was a great added personal touch for our party. The whole crew was incredibly professional throughout the sail, while remaining friendly and charismatic. Hoping for a reason to set sail with them again soon!!

The whole crew was incredibly professional throughout the sail, while remaining friendly and charismatic. Hoping for a reason to set sail with them again soon!!

originalText.text: We chartered the Freedom Luxury yacht to celebrate a birthday with our friends and family, kids included. The boat is spacious, with a capacity of 30+ and for our group of 22, it was just perfect with a variety of seating areas and decks. Everyone loved the boat and how well it was set up for us. Captain Paul was very friendly and professional since we got in touch to book it. This also reflects in how well the staff runs the charter. I would call out Lexi (Chief Stewardess) and Erica specifically for being very organized and helpful. Lexi stayed in touch leading up to our event and set up everything exactly how we wanted, including handling our outside catering delivery and engaging a good bartender. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: I rented a small yacht for 6 people for Memorial Day to celebrate my dads birthday and my dad being a veteran  (he’s in heaven). Capt Paul was very accommodating, professional and knowledgeable. He was able to deliver with 2 weeks notice. The captain hired to sail was absolutely amazing as well. Even through the minor paint job, there were able to give us such a memorable family experience. I will definitely rent in the future. Thank you so much.

originalText.text: Captain Paul and his crew are very accommodating and operate a safe and enjoyable trip. You can relax and trust them. Our family can't stop talking (and sharing pictures) about our combined birthday anniversary lunch cruise.
